name: Press to date
description:
tiny procedural card game about finding love (made for #procjam )

- Made by -

@ruben_oluwa : art

@Ludipe : design and code

@endlessnumber : music

- Instructions -

Pick two people

Choose cards

Pick similar cards to double (or triple) their score

Your points move the heart to the right

Your date's points move the heart to the left

Try to stay in the "match" zone during the last round (or stay out of it!)

- Notes -

Music might take a bit to load on the web version

Bugs are odd, let us know if you find one

Made in ~12h
